Title: Attacker
Description: Dodge recovers 20% faster and DMG dealt increases by 20%.

Title: Tank
Description: Attacks reduce 10% more DMG Reduction of the enemies. Gains Signal Orbs 20% faster from attacks.

Title: Support
Description: Receives 80% less healing and DMG dealt increases by 60%.

Title: Amplifier
Description: Receives 60% less healing and DMG dealt increases by 40%.
